verses.1: Topa phat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh eiteʼ Pasianʼ tungah phatnate i sak ding hoih hi. Phatna sak ding nuam a, zong a kilawm ahi hi.
verses.2: Topa in Jerusalem khuapi lam a, amah in a kinil khia Israel-te a kaikhawm hi.
verses.3: Amah in lungsim kitamte damsak a, amauʼ meimate a tuamsak hi.
verses.4: Amah in aksite a phazah ding seh a, tua aksite amau min ciatin a sam hi.
verses.5: Eiteʼ Topa lian a, ama vang lian mahmah hi. Amah in thu a theihtelna pen ngaihsut zawh ding hi lo hi.
verses.6: Topa in a kisikcip mite laam to-in, migilote leilak a denna hi.
verses.7: Topa tungah lungdamkohna la sa unla, laiza lasakna tawh eiteʼ Pasianʼ tungah la ngaih sa un.
verses.8: Amah in vanpite meiipi tawh tuamin, leitung adingin gun bawl a, mualte tungah lopa a posak hi.
verses.9: Amah in ganhingte le a ham va-aknote an a vak hi.
verses.10: Ama lungkimna le amah in nuam a saknate pen sakol thahatna le galhangteʼ hang hi lo hi.
verses.11: Amah a zahtak mite le ama itna kip a muangte tungah Topa a lungkim hi.
verses.12: Jerusalem khuapi aw, Topa phat in. Zion aw, nangma Pasian phat in.
verses.13: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in na kulh kongpi zawlte tosak a, nangma mite thupha hong piaksak hi.
verses.14: Amah in na gam sungah kilemna bawl a, mangbuh hoih pente tawh nang hong gilvahsak hi.
verses.15: Amah in thu hong pia a, ama thu manlangin leitung hong tung suk hi.
verses.16: Amah in tuumul bangin vukkhal hong pia a, vut bangin vukpak hong thehthang hi.
verses.17: Amah in suangtum bangin tui khalte hong lawn khia hi. Tua a votna kua in thuak zo ding ahi hiam?
verses.18: Amah in thu pia-in tuate tui suak hi. Amah in a huih nungsak a, tuite a luang hi.
verses.19: Amah in Jakob tungah ama thu gen a, Israel tungah ama ngeina kipte le ama biakna ngeina kipte a gen hi.
verses.20: Amah in tua bangin minam dang khat peuhpeuh tungah bawl ngei lo hi. Amaute in amah biakna ngeina kipte thei lo uh hi. Topa phat un.
